Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|やり|yomi=k}}
The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei|pos=stem or continuative form}} of {{m|ja|遣る|tr=yaru||to [[do]], [[execute]] → to [[kill]]}}. {{rfv-etymology|ja}}
